For Landlords

Unlock your portfolio’s full potential, with actionable data at your fingertips.

VTS gives you the insights you need to make better decisions faster – driving portfolio performance and increasing revenue.

Request Demo

Attract more tenants.

Unlock intel on market demand, leasing activity and in-place tenants. Create smarter property marketing strategies to generate more leads and bigger returns.

  • Content Management
  • Availabilities Api
  • Lead Feedback Dashboard
  • TIMs Tracking

Accelerate deal conversion.

Sign leases faster, improve conversion rates, and decrease downtime with real-time data. Streamline collaboration and automate workflows between asset managers, brokers and operating partners.

  • Pipeline Management
  • Deal Analysis
  • Approvals Workflow
  • Stacking & Site Plans

Retain and expand your tenant relationships.

Give your asset managers, property managers and leasing teams the ability to connect relationships across your portfolio, understand tenant needs and stay ahead of renewals — accelerating new deals and increasing retention.

  • Tenant Relationship Management
  • Key Lease Event Notifications
  • Encumbrance Alerts

Optimize portfolio performance.

Manage your properties with the power of empirical data. Streamline operations with custom reporting and revenue forecasting capabilities. Proactively surface risks and opportunities to stay one step ahead.

  • Portfolio Analytics
  • Flexible One-Click Reporting
  • Custom Reporting
VTS has totally transformed our leasing meetings, reporting is now done on a live basis.
Harry Foster, Asset Manager
Landsec
